content.text: Match ends, Elche 0, Barcelona 6.
Second Half ends, Elche 0, Barcelona 6.
Goal!  Elche 0, Barcelona 6. Pedro (Barcelona) left footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Neymar following a fast break.
Corner,  Elche. Conceded by Martín Montoya.
Foul by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona).
Jonathas (Elche) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Offside, Elche. Edu Albácar tries a through ball, but Jonathas is caught offside.
Foul by Marc Bartra (Barcelona).
Víctor Rodríguez (Elche) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Goal!  Elche 0, Barcelona 5. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Marc Bartra.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) because of an injury.
Delay in match Jonathas (Elche) because of an injury.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Edu Albácar.
Substitution, Elche. Coro replaces Aarón Ñíguez.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
David Lombán (Elche) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by David Lombán (Elche).

Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Roberto replaces Xavi.
Goal!  Elche 0, Barcelona 4. Neymar (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the high centre of the goal. Assisted by Lionel Messi with a through ball.
Substitution, Barcelona. Adriano replaces Jordi Alba.
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergio Busquets replaces Javier Mascherano.
Substitution, Elche. David Lombán replaces Adrián González.
Goal!  Elche 0, Barcelona 3. Neymar (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Lionel Messi with a through ball.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Sergio Pelegrín.

Substitution, Elche. Edu Albácar replaces Domingo Cisma because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Foul by Faycal Fajr (Elche).
Rafinha (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Adrián González (Elche) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
Goal!  Elche 0, Barcelona 2. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) converts the penalty with a left footed shot to the bottom left corner.
